name: 影音媒體創作（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【VDU0141  影音媒體創作（一）】
description: 以影像結合音樂為媒體及表現手法的藝術、影音科技與設計為主要方向，以帶來新的影音文化，藉此培養數位影像創作與音樂創作人才。結合影音藝術創作理論與音樂藝術之探索，創作影像與音樂相互呼應的藝術作品。
goals: 能熟練操作並靈活運用數位影音媒體科技。
能整合並應用不同手法於一作品。
熟悉以影音媒材傳達具創意的影音媒體創作。
能結合不同影音媒體於個人創作。
syllabus:
課程綱要Course Description  
This is a course of audio-visual media production that focuses on animated short film production. It allows students acquiring knowledge of and skills in audio-visual media production by learning how to make an animated short film.

教學進度Course Schedule  
Week1 2/26 Overview  
Week2 3/5 Theme & Story  
Week3 3/12 Storyboard  
Week4 3/19 Storyboard  
Week5 3/26 Production Design - Character  
Week6 4/2 Production Design - Set  
Week7 4/9 兒童節補假Children's Day adjusted to holiday  
Week8 4/16 Animatic 1st Draft  
Week9 4/23 Animatic 1st Draft  
Week10 4/30 Pencil Test  
Week11 5/7 勞動節補假Labor Day observed  
Week12 5/14 Final Project  
Week13 5/21 Final Project  
Week14 5/28 Picture Locked & Sound Design  
Week15 6/4 Picture Locked & Sound Design  
Week16 6/11 Final Project Review
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【VDU0141  影音媒體創作（一）】
